name: electrobun
description: Build ultra fast, tiny, and cross-platform desktop apps with Typescript.
author: Blackboard Technologies Inc.

scripts.build:cli: mkdir -p bin && bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --outfile bin/electrobun
scripts.dev:playground: bun build:dev && bun build:cli && cd playground && npm install && bun build:dev && bun start
scripts.dev:playground:linux: bun build:dev && npm link && cd playground && npm link electrobun && bun build:dev && bun start
scripts.dev:playground:clean: cd playground && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf vendors/cef && npm install && cd .. && bun dev:playground
scripts.dev:playground:clean:linux: cd playground && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf vendors/cef && npm install && cd .. && bun dev:playground:linux
scripts.dev:playground:canary: bun build:release && cd playground && npm install && bun build:canary && bun start:canary
scripts.run:playground: bun build:dev && bun build:cli && cd templates/interactive-playground && npm install && bun build:dev && bun start
scripts.push:beta: bun npm:version:beta && git push origin main --tags
scripts.push:patch: npm version patch && git push origin main --tags
scripts.push:minor: npm version minor && git push origin main --tags
scripts.push:major: npm version major && git push origin main --tags
scripts.test: bun build:dev && bun build:cli && cd tests && npm install && bun build:dev && bun start
